v1.body:
WhatsApp support team,
My WhatsApp number {{number}} was blocked due to spam.
Please review and restore my account.
Thank you.

v2.body:
Hello WhatsApp,
My account {{number}} has been blocked.
I believe this is a mistake.
Please help restore it.

v3.body:
Good day WhatsApp Team,
I would like to appeal the ban on my number {{number}}.
I did not violate any policy.
Regards.
